/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and roads.
